"Mech Power Survey: Cantera":
"A species of unidentified mechs are
running wild en el area de Cantera of
planet Lillipa.

Arks members are being dispatched to
engage and repel the unidentifed mechs
in question, and to collect data on
this new species.
――――――――――――――――――――
Clear: Collect [200] Quest Points
by defeating Mechs."
